title: Apple Hardware test
message: I'm new to this forum so please forgive me if I've missed something obvious. I see Mr. Rossmann using the apple hardware test on various repairs and his version looks different and works almost instantly. How is this done and what software are you using please?

title: Apple Hardware test
message: There is a torrent out there with all ASD tests total 56GB. I will not link to it because of copyright crap. Google is your friend. There are 2 versions of each ASD, the EFI version and OS version. The EFI version runs in seconds and is limited to basic tests.

title: Apple Hardware test
message: Thank you Thank you, Thank you.
